articles.title: Lenovo IdeaPad 5 featuring AMD's Ryzen 5 4500U APU goes on sale starting at US$649.99; cheaper Ryzen 3 4300U variant available in some countries - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Lenovo has started selling the IdeaPad 5 laptop with a Ryzen 4000 APU from AMD inside it. The 14-inch model with an AMD Ryzen 5 4500U can be had for a price starting at US$649.99 in the US, while shoppers in the UK can go for a cheaper 15-inch variant with th…
articles.content: Update April 27: Lenovo customers in the UK (and some other countries) can configure these IdeaPad laptops with numerous other components, including the processor. For example, the IdeaPad 5 15 can also be fitted with a Ryzen 5 4600U (+£30), Ryzen 7 4700U (+£… [+1553 chars]

articles.title: Apple leads India’s TWS earbuds market thanks to AirPods and AirPods Pro - 91mobiles
articles.description: Apple AirPods were the best best-selling hearables in India, followed by Realme Buds Air, pTron Bassbuds and Noise Shots X1 Air.
articles.content:
Realme Buds Air were the second best-selling earbuds after the AirPods
